MutateWeightsStrategy
IAsexualReproductionStrategy​<T>
public sealed
MutateWeightsStrategy​<T>
where T : struct

A NEAT genome asexual reproduction strategy based on mutation of connection weights.

Offspring genomes are created by taking a clone of a single parent genome and applying a weight mutation scheme to the connection weights of the clone.

Type Parameter
T

Connection weight data type.
